name: Shop Status
query:
SELECT
    a.name AS `Airport Name`,
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.status = 'Occupied' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Occupied Shop`,
    SUM(CASE WHEN s.status = 'Available' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS `Available Shop` 
FROM
    `tabAirport` a
LEFT JOIN
    `tabShop` s ON a.name = s.airport
GROUP BY
    a.name;
